- The Patternz Undercover Brella is a lightweight weapon.

- The matchmaking range is 11.8. The game's matchmaking system looks at a team's average matchmaking range value, and matches them against a team with a similar average.

- The Patternz Undercover Brella has a canopy with 200 HP, and regenerates 0.5 HP per frame (30 HP per second) when the canopy is not active and not destroyed.
Brella canopies have different incoming damage multipliers for each weapon type.

- Brella canopies have different incoming damage multipliers for each weapon type.

- The canopy does 15 damage on contact with a cooldown of 30 frames.

- The canopy cannot be launched.

- The canopy takes 3.7 seconds to regenerate if it is destroyed.

- The canopy will instantly regenerate to full health if the user gets a splat or an assist.

- Brella canopies have different incoming damage multipliers for each weapon type.

- Ink consumption is 4% per shot, allowing the user to fire 25 times with a full ink tank.

- After firing, there is a 40 frame (0.67 second) cooldown before the ink tank starts refilling.
After holding but not releasing the canopy, there is a 30 frame (0.5 second) cooldown before the ink tank starts refilling.

- When firing from humanoid form, the first shot takes 8 frames to come out. When firing from swim form, the first shot takes 15 frames to come out.

- After holding but not releasing the canopy, there is a 30 frame (0.5 second) cooldown before the ink tank starts refilling.

- The time between consecutive shots is 26 frames.

- The time between firing the weapon and being able to use a sub or enter swim form is 20 frames.

- The movement speed while firing is 0.072 units per frame.

- The movement speed while shielding is 0.072 units per frame.

- Each pellet has a base damage of 12 and minimum damage of 9.

- If a pellet is in the air for more than 8 frames after being fired, it will lose about 0.19 damage every frame until it reaches 9 damage at frame 24.

- The maximum damage that can be dealt to a single target per shot is 40.

- Pellets fly straight at 2.0 units per frame for 4 frames, covering a distance of 8 units.
After that, the speed of the pellets is set to 1.9085 units per frame if it is not already lower than the listed value, and they lose 36% of their speed every frame (including the first frame after they stop traveling straight). Undercover Brellas were designed with stealth in mind, so what was Emberz thinking with the Patternz Undercover Brella? I'll tell you what they were thinking...look over there! BOOM! You got distracted, leaving you open for splatting. And now you see the appeal of this wildly colorful brella that comes with Curling Bombs and the Killer Wail 5.1. Slide those Curling Bombs right under your enemy's nose as you charge the special for a deafening encore with the Killer Wail 5.1. It all adds up to a sneaky-good set for spy wannabes.
